## Loading the data

This project is so interesting and relevant to my life!

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```
Viewing the data
```{r}
glimpse(house_elections)
glimpse(candidates)
glimpse(committees)
glimpse(contributions)
```

I'm making a change!
